snippet: The police in Mexico captured a suspected member of the Zetas drug gang considered the mastermind behind a deadly casino fire in the city of Monterrey, the authorities said Friday.
abstract: Mexican police capture Baltazar Saucedo Estrada, a suspected member of the Zetas drug gang and considered to be the mastermind behind 2011 casino fire that killed 52 people in the city of Monterrey.
lead_paragraph: The police in Mexico captured a suspected member of the Zetas drug gang considered the mastermind behind a deadly casino fire in the city of Monterrey, the authorities said Friday.
